Record.ClassificationPath: Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Nutrition Disorders/Malnutrition/Deficiency Diseases/Protein Deficiency/Protein-Energy Malnutrition
Record.Description: The lack of sufficient energy or protein to meet the body's metabolic demands, as a result of either an inadequate dietary intake of protein, intake of poor quality dietary protein, increased demands due to disease, or increased nutrient losses.
